message.content: This question requires common sense and knowledge about electrical systems. When a transformer blows, it can cause a power outage in the surrounding area. Therefore, a person would need a flashlight in order to navigate in the dark until power is restored. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because they all require electricity to function properly and would not be useful during a power outage.

This question requires knowledge about what a transformer is and what it means for it to "blow." A transformer is a device that transfers electricity from one circuit to another through electromagnetic induction. When a transformer "blows," it means that it has malfunctioned or become damaged. This can lead to a power outage in the area it serves. In the event of a blown transformer, a person might use a flashlight to navigate in the dark since there would likely be a loss of electricity. Options (B), (C), and (D) are incorrect because they all require electricity to function and would not be usable during a power outage.
